title: St. John College of Engineering and Management - [SJCEM], Palghar - Admissions, Contact, Website, Facilities 2025-2026

Section.name: About SJCEM
Section.description:
St John College of Engineering and Technology (SJCET) is an institute which is managed by the Aldel Education Trust which is a Christian Religious Minority Institution as notified by the Maharashtra State Minorities Development Department which was established in the year of 2008. The main objective of the institute is to enhance and promote innovative technology by providing enabled teaching and learning process.
The SJCET is recognized by the Directorate of Technical Education (DTE) and Government of Maharashtra. The courses which are offered by the institute are Bachelor of engineering (B.E.) in Civil, Computer, Electronics & Telecommunication, Information Technology and Mechanical Engineering and Master of Management Studies (MMS) in the field of Human Resource, Marketing, Information Technology and Finance.
It has state of the art infrastructure facilities for their students like well-equipped laboratories, well stocked library, spacious drawing hall and bus service to and from Palghar Railway Station etc.The institute offers separate hostel accommodation facility for their girls and boys students. The shared accommodations for girl students is provided in campus which is supervised by the religious sisters and for boys the shared accommodation facilities are provided near the college premises.
Facts & Figures of St John College of Engineering and Technology (SJCET)
Approved By
All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE)
Affiliated By
University of Mumbai, Mumbai
How to Reach
-1.5 Kms from Palghar Railway Station
-18 Kms from Manor
-105 Kms from the Santacruz Domestic Airport
